item.title: Building a fully-accessible help tooltip
item.description: Today is one of those days that started out with a Google search for yet another accessibility question/concern. Iâ€™m working on a new project for my client Provata and part of that project is to build a sweet and seemingly simple help tooltip which explains to the reader/user what the Framingham calculator is. The tooltip is triggered by a small help icon like the one shown in the top right corner of this screenshot:
